item.title: Enabled comments support with giscus.
item.description: I’ve now enabled commments on this site based on giscus. This is an experiment, and if I drown in spam it will go away again. ðŸ˜…

item.title: The Rules of a Gentleman
item.description: Some of these are obsolete, in my opinion (who wears a watch these days?) But others are really profound. Worth adding to your RSS reader.
